content: our july makers kit is not a shawl cowl or hat it s just a basket the basket is about 8 tall and 8 in diameter an easy pattern we love the loop and closure detail too so you can close it up if you want to bring it along somewhere and use it like a yarn bowl looking for a kit click here 1 there is also a crochet version find that here 2 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/its-just-a-basket-x83626739 htm 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/its-just-a-crochet-basket
